author: bonsai1603
content:
hi - sorry but I was wondering what the process is for voting on diff bomb delay? Can just see github but there are no comments - where is the discussion and formal agreement - at allcoredevs maybe? Thanks a lot

https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/commit/a42f27aa2d1ece9d96b87098d6b3520e51359ec2

author: sky.cactus
content: There is no voting.  You can check out this article to get a better understanding of how Ethereum Governance works.  Also, this server isn't the right place to discuss governance: <https://micah-zoltu.medium.com/how-ethereum-governance-works-71856426b63a>

author: sky.cactus
content: We may want to consider bringing on one or more Asian/Australian time zone moderators so this stuff gets handled quicker.
